io.github.hhromic.uimr

Class SafeSimpleDateFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.hhromic.uimr.SafeSimpleDateFormat

  • public class SafeSimpleDateFormat
extends Object
    A Thread-safe (re-entrant) SimpleDateFormat wrapper class.

    This class implements a Thread-Safe (re-entrant) SimpleDateFormat class. It does this by using a ThreadLocal object that holds a map, instead of a traditional approach to hold the SimpleDateFormat object in a ThreadLocal object.

    Each ThreadLocal object holds a single HashMap containing SimpleDateFormats, keyed by a string format (e.g. "yyyy/M/d", etc.), for each new SimpleDateFormat instance that was created within the threads execution context.

    Original code taken from here, by John DeRegnaucourt. See link for more information.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    John DeRegnaucourt
    See Also:
    SimpleDateFormat
